Title: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to establish a rebate program for bikes with electric assist and electric scooters purchased for small businesses
Summary: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to establish a rebate program allowing for a rebate of up to $1,100 for bikes with electric assist and electric scooters purchased for small businesses.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the New York state energy research and development authority to establish a rebate program for bikes with electric assist and scooters purchased for small businesses
